alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 9:16PM CDT until June 23 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL JACKSON...EAST CENTRAL FOARD...NORTHWESTERN WILBARGER AND SOUTHEASTERN HARDEMAN COUNTIES... At 914 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles west of Odell to near Medicine Mound to 4 miles northwest of Margaret, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. The threat for large hail is highest between Chillicothe and Medicine Mound. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chillicothe, Margaret, Fargo, Medicine Mound, Odell, Rayland, and Copper Breaks State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
